Comments_List: What goes in the prospectus (archive, question, method, etc.)  this was very helpful and has helped me shape the project. Feedback on presentation also.

Strengths: presentation practice for the lightning talks. 
Weaknesses: None really.

For future instances it could be productive to have students prepare a first draft and discuss it in the seminar. That way every student goes into the Winter holidays with a first draft of the prospectus. This would perhaps mean having the Lightning Talks on the (two) Friday(s) before Thanksgiving break. I think that should be feasible.
